org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core
Contains an internal DSL for creating Cypher.

  • Uses of Relationship.Direction in org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Relationship.Direction
    While the direction in the schema package is centered around the node, the direction here is the direction between two nodes.

    ExposesRelationships.relationshipWith(Node other, Relationship.Direction direction, String... types)
